documentation.text: @dev Provides a set of functions to operate with Base64 strings.

documentation.text: @dev Converts a `bytes` to its Bytes64 `string` representation.

natspec.details: Provides a set of functions to operate with Base64 strings.

opcodes: PUSH20 0x0 ADDRESS EQ PUSH1 0x80 PUSH1 0x40 MSTORE PUSH1 0x0 DUP1 REVERT INVALID LOG2 PUSH5 0x6970667358 0x22 SLT KECCAK256 GAS NOT PUSH27 0x97A5ED4FE5B62C888A7BFDEB6253554436A6CC029ADC7C3A100274 0xCE PUSH8 0x64736F6C63430008 ISZERO STOP CALLER
